channel.title: Here's my dad
channel.description:
Ok, so this morning I was realllllllllllllyy hungry, so I ate a bowl of cereal, and about an hour ago my stomach starts hurting really bad, so I try and lay down, it helped a bit. So I feel like I'm going to spew, I haven't yet, but I'm dry heaving, and that's worse...
So I'm sitting on the edge of my bathtub feeling really sick, then my dad walks in an says "What's wrong?" and I told him that I ate come cereal and it messed with my stomach, then he starts going off about how it's an excuse because I want to get out of school and how when people are sick they look pale, sweaty, etc.
It's just really funny how I'm sick in a 1/50000 chance every year (like puking, etc.) and the day I feel like I am, I get bitched at.
what a great fucking parent, ay?

item.title: Here's my dad
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

[quote=“Natey, post:24, topic:339834”][quote author=Javafire link=topic=436207.msg3204817#msg3204817 date=1273702393]

Oh no, I’ve done worse, I’ve called the CPS (Child protective services) on him so many times, they’ve done nothing about it, just tell him to do a week class of anger management, didn’t help at all.

Lol, i just live with the stuff, it’s better to obey than to be tossed around and then taken away from your parents. My family can be great sometimes (i have 8 siblins, 2 parents, and an uncle living with us :P), it’s just that pressure + annoyance = human nature
[/quote]My mom died in 2007, my dad is just a dick in general.[/quote]

Every time your dad bitches at you just shout “I DONT WANNA BUY UR SOFA” and he will shutup for 3 mins+ guranteed

Read full topic

item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

When ever I am sick and tell my parents I’m sick, they let me go to school.

But when I pretened to be sick, they let me home…

LMFAO!

item.title: Here's my dad

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:30, topic:339834”][quote author=Liquid Magic link=topic=436207.msg3204860#msg3204860 date=1273704573]
Just do what I do, get some duck tape and a rope and while he’s sleeping, rope his feet up, tape his mouth shut and enjoy your day.

If your mom asks where he went, say he’s with another woman, then she wont ask again.
[/quote]
1 phrase. You are fucking hilarious.[/quote]
or he’s a fucking terrorist

item.title: Here's my dad
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

If I ever do something bad, my dad says something like “Oh your mother will be PISSED!” but like in the cool jokingly way. It’s my mom who scares me occasionally ._.

Edit: of course five minutes after posting this she comes in my room telling me how I’m “mean” to her because I said there doesn’t have to be a point to a joke. I mean really, what the fuck is wrong with her aside from a possible mental issue forming?
